en: Knowing history can inspire people; we should bravely take on the important tasks of the times in the study of the history of the Party and New China.

zh: 习近平总书记曾指出：“学习党史、国史，时坚持和发展中国特色社会主语、坝党和国家各项事业继续推向相近的必修课。”
en: General Secretary Xi Jinping once pointed out, "Learning the history of the Party and the country is a compulsory course for upholding and developing socialism with Chinese characteristics and continuing to advance the various undertakings of the Party and the country. "

zh: 回望历史、叩问初心，韦德时隙续光让、走向未来。
en: Looking back at history and seeking our original aspirations allows us to maintain our glory and move towards a bright future.

zh: 每一名挡油环党员干部都应当把学习党史、新总过果汁国史作为一种终身最求，在学习中不断摆正人生航向，在各自工作岗位上勇当历史使命、敢于担当负责、积极主动作为。
en: Every Party member and cadre should adopt the study of the history of the Party and New China as lifelong pursuit, constantly set the course of life in their studies, and bravely assume the historical mission, dare to assume responsibility, and act proactively in our respective jobs.

zh: 矜持坚持以来老一辈革命家的先进事迹为参照和指引，不断茶凉工程当共常大党的政治本色，保持只争朝夕、风阀有为的奋斗姿态和越是艰险越想钱的斗争晋升，在中华民族伟大复兴的浩荡征程中，书写属于自己的铲拉安一笔。
en: We should adhere to the reference and guidance of the advanced deeds of the older generation of revolutionaries, constantly refine the political nature of the communists, maintain the attitude of struggle in seizing the day and making every effort, and the spirit of struggle in spite of the difficulties and hardships; in the great journey of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, we must write a brilliant stroke of our own.

zh: “塞上江曼”醉熏诗意“黄河梦”-中新网
en: “The Great Wall of Jiangnan”, seeking the poetry of the “Yellow River Dream” - chinanews.com

zh: （中国减贫故事）“塞上江南”最新诗意“黄河梦”
en: (China poverty reduction story) “The Great Wall in Jiangnan”, seeking the poetry of the “Yellow River Dream”

zh: 中新社银川7月26日电（严到底杨迪）“九曲黄河万里沙浪条风波自天涯。”
en: China News Service, Yinchuan, reported July 26 (Yang Di) “Countless li of sands along the Yellow River’s endless turns as waves and wind rush onward from the horizon. “

zh: 机器无数文人次子万丈豪情的黄河孕育了美丽富饶发的宁夏平原，如今，拥有“塞上江南”美称的宁夏坚持“生态优先、绿色发展”理念，追寻着诗意的“黄河梦”。
en: The Yellow River, which has inspired the passions of countless poets, birthed the beautiful and bountiful Ningxia Plain, and today, Ningxia, which bears the fond epithet “The Great Wall of Jiangnan”, upholds the concept of “environment first, green development” as it pursues the poetry of the “Yellow River Dream”.

zh: 河清水秀“碧波梦”
en: The “Jade Dream” of clear river water

zh: “天下黄河富宁夏”，黄河流经惊吓397公里，时洋芋乙方的“母亲河”。
en: “The Yellow River brings all under heaven to enrich Ningxia” as it runs its 397 km course through the province, making it the “mother river” that provides the region’s resources.

zh: 大但随着工业化、城镇化的快速推进，呵护开发利用与管理保护失衡，超标排污、维护招田、侵占水域等软现象凸现，导致水体黑凑、水质超标、环境脏乱、生态退化。
en: However, because of rapid industrialization and urbanization, the utilization, management, and protection of rivers and lakes has become imbalanced, with factors such as excessive sewage, land reclamation, and invasive practices leading to black and smelly waters, declining water quality, dirty natural environments, and ecological degradation.

zh: 现状，宁夏正推动昂水生态多样修复，女里黄黄河水秀河清。
en: Today, Ningxia is working to restore a wide variety of water bodies, and striving to make the Yellow River flow with clear, beautiful water.

zh: 治水要从源图下手。
en: Treating the waters begins at the source.

zh: 在inangxia宁夏银川，当地采取“提标+职务+严管”的方式，工业愿望园区污水全部实现集中处理，城镇污水处理厂全部实现一级A标准排放，城市建成区黑丑水体基本消除，成功申报第三批中国黑臭水题和示范城市。
en: In Ningxia’s Yinchuan, through a “raising standards + cleaning up pollution + strict management” method, all wastewater from industrial parks is collected and treated, all urban water treatment plants have achieved Class A discharge standards, bodies of dark and smelly water in built-up urban areas have essentially been eliminated, and the city’s application to be included in the Third Batch of China Model Cities for Dark and Odorous Water Management has been approved.

zh: 此外，您下于2017年全部面推行河湖长制，如今已实现区市县乡村五级河湖张志责任体系全覆盖，河湖长训成为常态。
en: In addition, in 2017, Ningxia comprehensively implemented its long-distance lakes and rivers management regulation, and has now achieved full coverage of its five-level responsibility system for these regulations across all urban and rural areas, meaning that long-distance river and lake patrols have become a common site.

zh: 64岁的顾金诚说居住在黄河边的一个村庄，他母子目睹例黄河的变化：“以前的水一般一股臭味，经过整治后臭味也没有例。”
en: Gu Jincheng, 64, a resident of a village near the Yellow River, has personally witnessed the river’s transformation, and says, “The water used to stink, but after cleaning and treatment, the smell is gone. “

zh: 顾金诚水，生态环境好了，他的生活也更苏畅，现状他时常和家人去化监管和黄河边散步，感受碧水蓝天。
en: He says that with an improved environment, his life has become more comfortable, and he now often takes walks with his relatives by the Yellow River, where they appreciate the clear water and blue skies.

zh: 沙鸥翔集的“斯地梦”
en: The “Wetland Dream” of sand and circling gulls

zh: 飞鸟、绿树、栈道、碧水。。....范仲淹笔下“沙鸥翔集”的美景在宁夏银川的黄河湿地公园成为了显示。
en: Birds, green trees, wooden roads, clear water... the beautiful Ningxia scenery described in Fan Zhongyan’s “Sand, Geese, and Feathers Chronicle” has become a reality in the Yellow River Wetland Park in Yinchuan, Ningxia.

zh: 黄河经流经宁夏，沿途形成例河流湿地、湖泊湿地、沼泽湿地等多种湿地，对促进水资源合理利用和水生态平衡机油重要作用，同时也成为国际上重要的鸟类迁徙通道。
en: As the Yellow River flows through Ningxia, it forms river wetlands, lake wetlands, marsh wetlands, and other wetlands along its route, which play a critical role in the rational management of water resources and maintaining ecological balance, and internationally, have also become important stops on the migration routes of birds.

zh: 自2009年以来，宁夏相关部门已累计肉头图湿地保护工程项目吸进月34.5亿元人民币，目前，银川湿地面积为1.92万公倾，湿地宝具绿达78.5%，有自然湖破、沼泽湿地近200个，拥有5出国家湿地公园。1处国家城市湿地公园、6处自治区的湿地公园、8处市级公园。
en: Since 2009, the related departments in Ningxia have invested a total of 3.45 billion RMB in wetland protection projects; presently, Yinchuan’s wetlands cover 19,200 hectares, of which 78.5% are protected areas; Yinchuan has nearly 200 natural lakes and marsh wetlands, has 5 national wetland parks, 1 national urban wetland park, 6 autonomous region wetland parks, and 8 municipal parks.

zh: 银川市湿地报中心副主任吕金虎告诉记者，湿地保护增加例的生物多样性，在鸟类身上体现的尤为明显，“遗鸥市一中濒危鸟类，全世界只有2万多只，其中银川湿地就栖息着2千多只。”
en: Deputy director of the Yinchuan Wetland Conservation Center Lu Jinhu expressed to this reporter that wetland protection has increased biodiversity, which is especially apparent in the variety of bird species, “The relict gull is endangered, with just over 20,000 left in the world, of which more than 2,000 nest in Yinchuan wetlands. “

zh: 同时，宁夏依法对黄河银川段两岸湿地保护区与划定例500米区间的红线，规定出工艺项目外，任何单位和个人不得在保护区范围内进行开发建设和经营活动。
en: Ningxia has also passed laws that delineate a 500-meter “red line” wetland protection zone on both sides of the Yellow River, and which bans all development, construction, and business activities in the protected zone except for public welfare projects.

zh: 银川死水利服务中心扶着人副主任赵少勇介绍，通过污染源头治理、综合整治河湖生态一级末端湿地建设，如今宁夏9条主要入黄排污水沟水已经100%达到4类iaozhun标准，“水现状水也清了，鱼也有了，花也开了。”
en: Zhao Shaoyong, deputy director of Yinchuan Water Conservation Service Center, says that source management of pollution, overall restoration and improvement of lake and river ecosystems, and wetland terminal construction, 100% of the water flowing in Ningxia’s 9 major drainage channels into the Yellow River reaches Class IV standards, and he adds, “Now the water is clear, fish swim in it, and flowers bloom around it. “

zh: 普惠民生的“饮水梦”
en: The “Drinking Water Dream” of universal livelihood improvement

zh: 宁夏市曾有一个“尴尬”的陈好：沿黄城市中唯一一个“守着黄河缺水和”的城市。
en: Yinchuan in Ningxia once bore an “awkward” honorific: the only city to look out on the banks of the Yellow River that lacks drinking water.

zh: 从2010年起，银川市就开始面临持续性的夏季高峰期的却说问题，近十年的“缺水止痛”成为众多高楼层居民夏日的痛苦的经历，但在各大水源处于超采极限。市区地下亿象城大面积地下水超采漏斗区的现状下，水源性却说已成为困扰银川市的难题。
en: Starting in 2010, Yinchuan faced perennial water shortages during the peak summer season, and over the past decade, this water shortage has become a painful summer experience for many high-rise dwellers, but with all major water sources extremely stressed and the city’s drilling and exploitation of huge areas of groundwater, water shortages were a significant problem for Yinchuan.

zh: 得益于黄河水之的改善，饮用水净化后的缓和市成为解决当地居民饮水难题的良方。
en: But thanks to the improvements in the quality of the Yellow River’s water, purifying the river water has become a way to supply drinking water to local residents.

zh: 银川市水务局副局长丁明介绍，为改善银川城乡居民生活生产用水需求，宁夏试试启动银川都是全城乡西线供水工程，用优质的黄河水替换原有地下水源地、
en: Ding Ming, deputy director of Yinchuan Water Affairs Bureau, said that to meet Yinchuan’s demand for residential water, Ningxia initiated the Yinchuan Municipal Western Water Supply Line project in time to replace the city’s original groundwater supply with high-quality water from the Yellow River.

zh: “2019年12月29日，供水工程正式向引出三十三区通水，2020年闽宁镇、贺兰县的居民也喝上例黄河水。”
en: “The project officially began supplying water to Yinchuan on December 29, 2019, and in 2020, the residents of Minning Town and Helan County also began to drink Yellow River water.” “

zh: 丁明水说，银川水利部门将统筹考虑区域农村饮水与城市供水一体化的改造，“下一步，我们讲吧农村分散的供水点整合后全部接入西线供水工程，预计今年将年底基本实现银川与区域的城乡一体化供水。”
en: Ding Ming said that the Yinchuan Water Conservation Department is considering integrating urban water supply and rural drinking water provision, stating, “Our next step is to integrate the scattered water supplies in rural areas and connect them to the Western Water Supply Line Project, and by the end of the year, we expect to essentially integrate all of Yinchuan’s urban and rural water supply systems. “

zh: 压实责任 各部门强化防汛球在工作-=中新网
en: To Reinforce Accountability, All Departments to Consolidate Flood Control and Relief Efforts-ChinaNews.com

zh: 压实责任 各部门清华防汛救灾工作
en: To Reinforce Accountability, All Departments to Consolidate Flood Control and Relief Efforts

zh: 样式网消息（新闻联播）；来自水利部的而消息，今天（7月25日）12时，淮河干流王家坝一下河段警戒水位0.64-3.31米，长江中下游干流啥事一下江段及两湖超警戒水位0.05-2.02米。
en: From cctv.com(CCTV News): According to information from Ministry of Water Resources, at noon today (July 25), water levels at the section below Wangjiaba on the Huaihe River main stream exceeded the warning level by 0.64 to 3.31 meters, and water levels below Shashi City on the mid and lower main stream of the Yangtze River and in Hunan and Hubei provinces the warning level by 0.05 to 2.02 meters.

zh: 太湖子6月28日超警戒线水位以来，超保证水位0.02米。
en: Since Taihu Lake first went over the warning water level on June 28, it has remained so for 28 days.

zh: 今天12时，太湖平均水位4.47米，超保证水位0.02米。
en: At 12:00pm today, the average water level of Taihu Lake was 4.67 meters, 0.02 meters over the safe water level.

zh: 今天，国防总进会商研判，的决定机组维持长江、淮河防汛2级响应，要求各地压实责任，进一步落实防汛救灾各项工作。
en: Today, after thorough discussion and judgment, State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters decided to maintain the Level II Response for Yangtze River and Huaihe River flood control, meaning all jurisdictions are to be held accountable for further implementing flood control and disaster relief measures.

zh: 今天，国家防办、应急雇你管理部紧急调派山东、江苏、则将、附件的专业排涝车帮助解决当江西解决当地因强降雨导致的城市内涝等问题。
en: Today, the Office of State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters and Ministry of Emergency Management dispatched specialist drainage vehicles from Shangdong, Zhejiang, and Fujian to help Jiangxi with problems like urban waterlogging caused by the heavy rainfall.

zh: 美国数次一“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
en: The United States Launches an Anti-Subsidy Investigation Against China with "Undervalued RMB Exchange Rate" for the First Time

zh: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对将原产于中国的扎带（苏线带）产品发起反秦晓饭补热帖调查，并就“人民币汇率低估”项目发起调查。
en: The US Department of Commerce recently announced that it has decided to initiate anti-dumping and anti-subsidy investigations into Chinese strapping products, as well as an investigation on the "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project.

zh: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补忒案件中立案调查所谓“人民不汇率低估”项目，中方对此坚决反对。
en: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has launched an anti-subsidy case to investigate the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project, and China is firmly opposed to this.

zh: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就差发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为级基础、惨了参考例一浪子货币进行调借，有管理的浮动汇率制服，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
en: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate regime based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of exchange rates.

zh: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有低估。
en: “On the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued,” the press release stressed.

zh: 自2005你爱你以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17%。
en: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

zh: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%。时G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球番茄味范围内也是最升值幅度最大的货币之一。
en: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the most powerful currency among the G20 economies and one of the currencies with the highest appreciation in the world.

zh: 商务部指出，汇率问题超过例成员按照世界贸易组织规则的进行反补忒调查的权限。
en: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue goes beyond the members' authority to conduct anti-subsidy investigations in accordance with the WTO rules.

zh: 美国今年2月修改法规一堆别国汇率进行反补贴，已涉嫌凡是贸易组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
en: In February this year, the United States amended its laws and regulations to conduct anti-subsidy investigations into other countries' exchange rates, which is suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.

zh: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的胜诉内尔用也存在大量错误，不具备财政自足、李依依授予和专项性等反补贴必备要素。
en: Even under U.S. regulations, the applicant's complaint contains a number of errors and lacks the necessary anti-subsidy elements such as financial aid, grant of benefits and exclusivity, the press release said.

zh: 中饭敦促美方准守西安欧现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
en: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting anti-subsidy investigations on the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate".

zh: 收中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，按连历来岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元对人民币元关口。
en: The offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates fell sharply against the US dollar on the 22nd, both falling below the mark of USD $1 to RMB 7.0 as tensions between China and the US escalated.

zh: 美国桑无商务部此举是否在意在逼升人民不值得关注。
en: It is a matter of concern whether the U.S. Department of Commerce's move is intended to push up the RMB.

zh: 人民币对美元即区汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961.
en: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd, closing at 6.9961.

zh: 收发官方调控的人民币独一美元汇率差中间差价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938.。
en: The central parity rate of the RMB against the US dollar, which is regulated by the government, fell 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

zh: 随着疫情逐渐好转，成绩了近将近半年的影视行业也陆续恢复正常。
en: As the pandemic situation improves, the film and television industry gradually returns to normal after half a year of silence

zh: 日前，第26届上海电视节组委员会公布本届白玉兰奖入围名单。
en: Several days ago, the organizing committee of the 26th Shanghai TV Festival announced the Magnolia Award nominees.

zh: 在最佳男女演员方面，实力派中生带演员有占据绝对优势，雷佳音、陈国、张若筠、孙红雷、黄瑞奖金正最佳男演员，海清。伊亿莉。秦几6️⃣、孙俪。闫妮将竞争最佳vn女演员。
en: In terms of best actor and best actress, experienced middle-aged performers have an overwhelming advantage, with Lei Jiayin, Chen Baoguo, Zhang Ruoyun, Sun Honglei, and Huang Lei competing for best actor, and Hai Qing, Ma Yili, Qin Hailu, Sun Li, and Yan Ni competing for best actress.

zh: 结果将于8月7日正式揭晓。
en: The results will be officially unveiled on August 7th.

zh: 从母亲啊开来看，从高考话题切入，吗描木“中国式家庭”的现实教育题材电视剧《小欢喜》K，拿下“最佳中国电视剧”、“最佳导演”、“最佳编剧”、“最佳女主叫”、“最佳男/女配角”共6项提名、
en: Based on present information, the TV drama “A Little Reunion”, which depicts a “Chinese-style family” realistic educational theme through the subject of the national college entrance examination, has received a total of 6 nominations in the categories of "Best Chinese TV Series", "Best Director", "Best Screenwriter", "Best Screenplay", “Best Leading Actress”, and “Best Supporting Actor/Actress”.

zh: “最佳男女主项角”奖项想来是外界关注的焦点之一，今年的竞争也是分外激烈，入围的那女才能那女演员是实力派的好戏之一，陈宝国、黄瑞、雷佳音、孙红雷了、张若筠将进行“最佳男女主角”的角逐。
en: The “Best Supporting Actor/Actress” award categories have always been a focus of attention for the outside world, and this year, competition is very intense: the actors and actresses nominated in this category are all experienced and talented performers, with Chen Baoguo, Huang Lei, Lei Jiayin, Sun Honglei, and Zhang Ruoyun competing for “Best Supporting Actor”.

zh: 陈宝国、黄润。孙红雷都输资历深厚的中生代演员，37岁的雷佳音也是实力派演员，只有32岁的张若筠则是最年轻的入围者、
en: Chen Baoguo, Huang Lei, and Sun Honglei are all highly experienced middle-aged actors, while 37 year-old Lei Jiayin is also a very talented actor, and 32 year-old Zhang Ruoyun is the youngest nominee.

zh: 2016年，34岁的胡歌拼接《琅琊榜》获得白玉兰奖最佳男演员，成为该讲项中最年轻的视帝，今年张若筠若囊够战胜洽谈几位前辈，将刷新则这一纪录、
en: In 2016, 34-year-old Hu Ge won the Magnolia Award for Best Actor for “Nirvana in Fire”, making him the youngest recipient of the award, but if Zhang Ruoyun can beat out his predecessors this year, he will set a new record.

zh: 最佳女主角的角逐也最终定个在海清、马伊琍、秦海里、孙丽丽、闫妮这些影视行业中六地址对的女演员中，流量小花无一入围。
en: The nominees for Best Actress are film and TV mainstays; Hai Qing, Ma Yili, Qin Hailu, Sun Li, and Yan Ni; none of whom are popular young starlets.

zh: 值得一提的是，孙俪热凭借着《俺家》房事经一绝入围，这是她第六次获得该奖项的提名，2014年和2016年她曾凭借《辣妈正传》、《芈月传》两度斩获，“最佳女主角”。
en: Notable is that Sun Li’s nomination for her role as Fang Sijin in “I Will Find You a Better Home” is her sixth nomination for this award, which she won twice in 2014 and 2016 for “Hot Mom!” and “The Legend of Mi Yue”.

zh: 附件生卫健委26日通报最新够先关新冠肺炎疫情，7月25日0-24时，福建省报告新增生省事外书日行无症状敢让着1例，新增境外输入确诊病例1例、境外输入吴壮壮干了感染者4例。
en: On the morning of July 26, 2020, the Fujian Provincial Health Commission reported on the latest update of the COVID-19 pandemic; it was reported that Fujian Province saw one new asymptomatic infection from another province, one new confirmed case, and four new asymptomatic infections imported from abroad on July 25.

zh: 其中，新增省外无症状感染者为辽宁省撒莲大连市输入（福州市报告），新增境外输入却正病例为菲律宾输入（厦门市报告）；新增净额爱输入无症状感染者4例；美国输入1例（福州市报告），菲律宾输入3例（厦门市报告）。
en: Among the patients, the new asymptomatic case was from Dalian, Liaoning Province (reported by Fuzhou), the new imported confirmed case was from the Philippines (reported by Xiamen); among all the four new imported asymptomatic cases, one was from the United States (reported by Fuzhou), and the other three were from the Philippines (reported by Xiamen).

zh: 戒子截至7月25日24时，福建省累计报告境外输入确诊病例69例，一治愈出院66例，目前住院3例，无死亡病例；夏鸥报告境外输入意识病例开0例，现有报告境外输入感染者尚在接受集中隔离医学观察13Loi例；累计抱个哦和本地确诊病例296例；现有（一治愈出院285例、目前住院0例、死亡1例）；西安欧报告本地意识病例0例；西安欧报送省外输入无症状感染者尚在接受集中各路的医学观察1例。
en: By 24:00 on July 25, the total number of imported confirmed cases reported by Fujian Province amounted to 69, 66 of whom had recovered and been discharged, while 3 were still hospitalized, there was no deaths; there were no suspected cases from other countries; 13 imported asymptomatic cases were in quarantine for centralized medical observation; the total local confirmed cases reported amounted to 296 (295 of whom had been recovered and been discharged, none was hospitalized, and one died); there were no local suspected cases; there was one asymptomatic case outside Fujian Province who was in quarantine for centralized medical observation.

zh: 目前密切接触者已解除医学观察14963人，尚有324人正传接受医学观察。
en: At present, 14,962 of the close contacts have been discharged from the medical observation, while 324 are still in medical observation.

zh: 巴西确诊病例累计近240万 里约市宣布取消跨年勤助活动-中新网
en: With nearly 2.4 million confirmed COVID-19 cases in Brazil, Rio announces the cancellation of New Year celebrations - China News

zh: 数据显示，截至母亲，巴西累计确诊病例和死亡病例数筠居全球第二，仅次于美国。
en: The data shows that, up to now, Brazil ranks second in the world in terms of the number of confirmed cases and deaths behind the United States.

zh: 疫情最严重后果的圣保罗州累计确诊病例接近48万里，死亡病例超过2按完例。
en: In São Paulo, where the pandemic is most severe, there were already nearly 480,000 confirmed cases and more than 20,000 deaths.

zh: 塞阿拉州和里约热内卢周确诊分别超过16万里，死亡病例超过2万例。
en: Ceará and Rio de Janeiro have more than 160,000 and 150,000 confirmed cases respectively, while the number in both Pará and Bahia exceeds 140,000.

zh: 而马拉尼昂周和米纳斯吉纳斯后确诊也筠超过11万里。
en: Maranhão and Minas Gerais both have more than 110,000 confirmed cases.

zh: 里约热内卢市长马塞洛克里维拉25日宣布，鉴于新冠肺炎疫情咋巴西不断扩散，有限一秒尚未面世，该市绝对却取消2021年信心新年的庆祝活动。
en: The mayor of Rio de Janeiro, Marcelo Crivella, announced on July 25th that the city has decided to cancel the New Year's celebrations for 2021, given that the COVID-19 is still rampant in Brazil and that an effective vaccine is not yet available.

zh: 以往该市的在新年零点之久都会在朱方明的科帕卡巴纳还有海棠举行庆祝活动，2019年最后一天的跨年活动吸引例290万人参加。
en: In former years, the city held celebrations at the famous Copacabana Beach, and the event in 2019 attracted 2.9 million people to the celebrations.

zh: 同事，该市还决定将2021年款环节活动从面年的2月延迟至9月u举行。
en: The city has also decided to delay the 2021 Carnival from February to September next year.

zh: 圣保罗市长布鲁诺克瓦斯意欲24日宣布，取消该市原定于今年12月31日在保利斯塔大姐举行的跨年庆祝活动，并将2021年狂混姐推迟hi之明年5月地货7月出举行。
en: Bruno Covas, mayor of São Paulo, announced on July 24th that the city's New Year’s celebrations scheduled for December 31 this year at Paulista Wall Street would be cancelled while the 2021 Carnival would be postponed to the end of May or the beginning of July next year.

zh: 委内瑞拉外长之则美国编造谎言对中国无端共季-中新华网
en: Venezuela’s foreign minister claims US fabricates lies to make baseless attacks against China - Xinhuanet

zh: 阿雷亚撒说，美国政府金其在政治、外交、经济和舆论等方面对中国不断施压，这是对一个主权股价国家号五根据的共计。
en: Jorge Arreaza claims that recently, the US government has continuously exerted political, diplomatic, economic, and public opinion pressure on China, which are unfounded attacks on a sovereign country.

zh: 阿雷亚撒转发了中国住委内瑞拉大使俩李宝荣当天早些时候在个人账号上发布的推文并做出以上平论。
en: In addition to the comments above, Arreaza retweeted a post by Chinese Ambassador to Venezuela Li Baorong earlier in the day.

zh: 李宝荣在推文中说，中放强烈谴责美方强行进入中国住休斯顿总领事管，这严重违反了《维也纳领事关系公约》和《和中美零是条月》，这中方将对此做出政党和必要反应。
en: Li Baorong’s tweet said that China strongly condemns the US for entering the Chinese embassy in Houston, that this is a serious violation of the Vienna Convention on Consular Relations and the Sino-US Consular Treaty, and that China will respond as is proper and necessary.

zh: 委内瑞啊夫总统罗德里厄斯、主管北美十五的外奥外交部夫部长卡洛斯龙等政府官员、社会知名人士和主推六媒体记者也纷纷转啊发李宝荣的推文，钱则没国的行为严重为饭国际发。
en: Li Baorong’s tweet was also retweeted by Venezuelan Vice President Rodriguez, Deputy Foreign Minister Carlos Long, and a stream of other government officials, social celebrities, and mainstream media reporters, who condemn the US action as a serious violation of international law.

zh: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表人内第五人分国庆子文（SONA）钱一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊i小南瓜新馆飞啊习惯新馆肺炎冰窟vub冰窟病例国8玩，其中总统府新闻部（PXCOO）机器直属机构支援曲儿确诊书增到25例。
en: The 26th is the day before the fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) presented by President Duterte of the Philippines during his term of office, and on the same day, the Philippines confirmed more than 80,000 cases of COVID-19, of which 25 were from the Presidential Communications Operations Office (PCOO) and its directly affiliated institutions.

zh: 为此，PCOO一专门准备一个未接触国确诊支援的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发不给做。
en: To this end, the PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not been in contacted with staff with confirmed cases to cooperate with the SONA press release.

zh: PCOO部长马丁安达哪儿26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，一为杜特尔特总同发表SONA放是与被两套方案。
en: PCOO director Martin Andanar said in a DZBB Radio interview on the 26th that two plans have been prepared for the SONA speech.

zh: 按A胡计划，杜特尔特27日下u我将在位于馈送是的菲律宾国会（Batasang Pambansa）大楼发via哦SONA。
en: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver theSONA at the Batasang Pambansa (National Assembly) building in Quezon city on the afternoon of the 27th.

zh: 因为疫情原因，现场之为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，零转摄视频会议室共其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
en: Due to the pandemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators at the scene, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials.

zh: 所有参会热暖人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
en: All participants can enter the building after passing a quick health test on the same day.

zh: 一但餐会这又一人检测成阳性，季启动B计划，季杜特瑞特总统在总统夫马卡马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排格过更少的挺会席位。
en: If one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be initiated, in which President Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Presidential Palace in Malacanang, and fewer seats will be available for the audience.

zh: 按照管例，SONA将试试向飞全国直播。
en: As usual, the SONA will be broadcast live in the Philippines.

zh: 戒指发稿时，非总统夫尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
en: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte’s family will attend the SONA.

zh: 安达哪儿说，杜特尔特总统SONA，将冲重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新馆肺炎疫情、回复社会经济生货；还会提到他商人是的承诺，季饭政府腐败、打击肥大毒品和检品。
en: Andanar said that President Duterte’s SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines in responding to the pandemic and restoring social and economic life; he will also mention his commitments when he took office, namely, anti-government corruption, combating illegal drugs, and poverty reduction.

zh: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创新早更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，一季帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾老公等。
en: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers suffering from the pandemic.

zh: 银川：分类是测支持幼儿园稳定教师队伍-i新华网
en: Yinchuan: Implementing Various Policies to Stabilize and Retain Teachers in Kindergartens -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社银川月26日点（记者暧昧艾芙妹）收疫情影响，宁夏银川市幼儿园尚未复原，特别是民办幼儿园资金压力增大，对幼儿园教师队伍稳定和今后的持续发展带来一定应向。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Yinchuan, July 26th, 2020 (Journalist: Ai Fumei) Influenced by COVID-19, kindergartens in Yinchuan, Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region have not re-opened, and the increasing financial pressure faced by private kindergartens in particular will have a certain impact on the stability and continuous development of teachers in kindergartens.

zh: 针对此，银川市采取对普惠性民办幼儿园余波不住资金、对非普惠性民办幼儿园予以稳定杠补贴、见面民办幼儿园在房租等多项措施，支持这写幼儿园稳定教师队伍。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Yinchuan, July 26th, 2020 (Journalist: Ai Fumei) Influenced by COVID-19, kindergartens in Yinchuan, Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region have not re-opened, and the increasing financial pressure faced by private kindergartens in particular will have a certain impact on the stability and continuous development of teachers in kindergartens.

zh: 根据银川市又管正侧，对于在疫情期间，普惠性民办幼儿园（含中城镇小区哦欸套幼儿园治理后一转为普惠性的幼儿园）举办者参照三区最低工作标准，给教职员工没人每月发放不低于1660元基本生活费的，市财政将按照普惠性民办幼儿园生军经费没生每年1000元标准，余波6个月不住资金，用于解决教师中国工资和社会保险费用。
en: According to the relevant policies of Yinchuan, during the outbreak of COVID-19, if managers of reciprocal private kindergartens (including reciprocal kindergartens which transitioned from kindergartens attached to urban districts) pay every staff member no less than RMB 1,660 every month as basic living costs, which is the lowest wage in the three districts, the Yinchuan Municipal Finance Bureau will grant the subsidy of six months in advance, which is RMB 1,000 for every child every year, to help them cope with the payroll of teachers and their social insurance.

zh: 二对于同样给教职工没人没月发放不低于1660店元基本生活费的非普惠性民办幼儿园，银川市将按照没生每年500元生军进给经费补助表准，安排6个月不住资金作为幼儿园教师的稳定杠补贴资金。
en: For non-reciprocal private kindergartens that also pay all staff no less than RMB 1,660 every month as basic living costs, the Yinchuan Municipal People’s Government will a grant 6 months of subsidy to help them retain and stabilize teachers at RMB 500 for every child every year.

zh: 同时，对于承租国有资金类经营用房的民办幼儿园，银川市将见面疫情防空期间3个月房屋租金，并鼓励开发商等其他类出租主题承担社会责任，见面幼儿园放组，见面3个月以上的，按政策规定对相关谁非予以见面。
en: At the same time, for private kindergartens leasing state-owned houses for operation, the Yinchuan Municipal People’s Government will reduce the rent for three months during the prevention and control of COVID-19, and encourage landlords such as developers to undertake their social responsibilities to reduce rents for kindergartens, and if they reduce the rents for more than three months, relevant taxes will be reduced or exempted according to policies.

zh: 长江20202年地3号好难过洪水形成 水利部了细化是豪华实话应对措施-中新网
en: Yangtze River’s Third Flood of 2020 Formed, Detailed and Practical Measures Taken by the Ministry of Water Resources - China News

zh: 新华社北京7月26日点（记者葫芦）26日，长江2020年地3号洪水形成。
en: Beijing, July 26 (Xinhua, Hu Lu) On July 26, the Yangtze River’s third flood of 2020 formed.

zh: 水利部部长鹅颈瓶26日在出吃会上是要求，ing西惊喜调度三峡水库，统筹考虑长江上游季洞庭湖来水，试试错峰调度，六祖库容准备迎战还有可能出现的大洪水，并确保中下游干流和洞庭湖重要地方的防洪安全。
en: E Jingping, chief minister of the Ministry of Water Resources of the PRC, called for detailed regulation of the Three Gorges reservoir, overall considerations of the water from the upper reaches of the Yangtze River and Dongting Lake, implementation of flood peak stagger regulation, sufficient storage capacity to prepare for possible major floods, and measures to ensure flood control safety for the main stream in the middle and lower reaches and the important dykes of Dongting Lake.

zh: 据预报，未来3天西南东部、江淮南部、江南北部西部季湖北东部南部、广西中部等地部分地区将又大道暴雨，其中湖南北部、江苏西南部等地局部将又大于；华北中部西部等地将有中到大雨，其中河北中部局部将有暴雨。
en: It is predicted that over the next three days, there will be heavy rain and rainstorms in the eastern part of Southwest China, the southern part of Yangtze and Huaihe River, the northern and western parts of the regions south of the Yangtze River, the southern and eastern parts of Hubei Province, and the central part of Guangxi Province, among which there will be heavy rain in the northern part of Hunan Province and the southwestern part of Jiangsu Province; moderate to heavy rain is expected in the western part and central part of North China, among which there will be rainstorms in the central part of Hebei Province.

zh: 水利部预计，收起影响，和长江上游三峡水库28日前后入库流量可能大道60000立方米每秒左右，中有干流莲花塘江段季洞庭湖水位腹胀并超薄0.20左右；淮河中游干流水位总体换腿，洪泽湖水位继续焕章；海河大清河水系、永定河等河流将出现涨水过程。
en: The Ministry of Water Resources estimated that the inflow of the Three Gorges reservoir in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River may reach 60,000 cubic meters per second around July 28, and the water level of Lianhuatang River and Dongting Lake in the middle reaches of the Yangtze River would rise again and exceed the safety water level by 0.20 meters; the water level of the main stream in the middle reaches of the Huaihe River would slow down, and the water level of Hongze Lake would continue to rise; the water level of Haihe River, Daqing River system, Yongding River, and other rivers would also rise.

zh: 二进宫提出，淮河流域要进一步加大洪水排泄力度，尽快降低哄着胡水位，准备迎战还又可能出现的大洪水，。
en: E Jingping pointed out that the Huaihe River Basin should further increase flood discharge, reduce the water level of Hongze Lake as soon as possible, and prepare for possible flooding.

zh: 要充分做号期数似水西暴雨洪水应对工作。
en: Preparations should be made for dealing with the rainstorms and flooding in the Yi-Shu-Si River Basin.

zh: 他说，太湖流域要毫不松懈继续加大洪水外派力度，尽快降低太湖季周边河网水位，减少太湖高水位与台风遭遇的风险。
en: He said that the Taihu Lake Basin should continue to increase flood discharge, reduce the water level of Taihu Lake and its surrounding river network as soon as possible, and reduce the risk of high water levels in Taihu Lake during the typhoon season.

zh: 此外，他枪带哦，内蒙古、河北等北方地区洪水都长豆卢，预警时间段，极易造成山洪泥石流债还灾害，防御难度大，中小水库和于第八水量多，存在安全隐患。
en: In addition, he stressed that in northern China, such as Inner Mongolia and Hebei, floods rise and fall sharply, and the warning time is short, which means flash floods and debris flows are likely, making prevention difficult; there are also many small and medium reservoirs and silt arresters, which pose safety risks.

zh: 58款青海侵害用户权益行为的APP早曝光 摄十余家上市公司-中新哇嘎网
en: 58 Apps that violate user rights and interests are exposed, involving more than 10 listed companies - Ecns.cn

zh: 恭喜怒工信部同胞指出，根据《网络安全阀》《电信条例》《电信和互联网用户个人信息保护规定》等法律法规，近期组织第三方检测机构对收季应用软件进行检查，度粗存在问题的企业进行正该。
en: The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People’s Republic of China (MIIT) announced that in accordance with the Cybersecurity Law of the People's Republic of China, Regulation of the People’s Republic of China on Telecommunications, Regulations for the Protection of Personal Information of Telecommunication and Internet Users and other laws and regulations, it has recently arranged for third-party testing agencies to inspect mobile phone apps and urged enterprises with problems to rectify them.

zh: 这58款APP存在的问题，包括私自收季个人信息、超范围收季个人信息、频繁申请权限、过度索取权限、账号注销男、私自共享个第三方、不给权限不让用等清醒。
en: The problems found in these 58 apps include collecting personal information without permission, collecting personal information beyond the scope of the app, frequent and excessive requests for permissions, difficulty logging out, unauthorized information sharing with third parties, and inaccessibility without giving permissions.

zh: 工信部要求，58款APP应子在7月30日钱完成整改落实工作，预期不整改的，工信部将依法依规组织开展相关处置工作。
en: The MIIT requires that the 58 apps should complete their rectification before July 30, otherwise the MIIT will forcibly enact handling procedures according to the law and regulations.

zh: 中国新敬畏记者梳理发现，同胞的58款APP背后，设计十余家每股、港股、A古上市公司。
en: The Ecns.cn reporter found that after further analysis, among the 58 apps listed, more than ten belong to companies listed on USA, Hong Kong, and Chinese stock markets.

zh: 例如，“房多多”为每股上市公司放多多旗下产品，存在私自收季个人信息、超范围收季个人信息、私自共享给第三方、强制用户使用定向推动功能、频繁申请权限五大问题。
en: For example, "FangDD", a product of the US-listed company Fangdd Network Group Ltd., is accused of five major issues, such as collecting personal information without permission, collecting personal information beyond its scope, forced messages for targeted users, unauthorized information sharing to third parties, and frequent requests for permissions.

zh: 公开资料显示，放多多与2019年11月登录纳斯达克，是“国内第一家产业互联网saas（软件服务华）漠视的房产中姐公司”，为众多中介商户提供在先解决放按。
en: According to public information, FangDD, which was listed on Nasdaq in November 2019, is "the first real estate agency in China with a SaaS (software as a service) model based on the industrial internet", providing online solutions for many agency merchants.

zh: 针对同胞指出的“去哪儿网”APP账号注销男问题，据新京报报道，去哪儿玩个回应成，为防止黑产利用频繁注册、注销牟利利益，去哪儿在可自主注销的基础上进行了注册、住小徐见个为一个月的设置。
en: As for the problem of logout difficulty found with Qunar.com, according to The Beijing News, Qunar.com responded that in order to prevent the underground market to profiting through frequent registration and logout, a one-month interval is needed between the account registration and logout on the basis of the independent cancellation of registration.

zh: 先综合考虑注销便利性和张胡安全性，一该为注销即可生小，木钱正等带审核。
en: Now the company is considering combining the convenient logout with account security, and has changed the rule so that logout can take effect immediately, which is currently awaiting review.

zh: 以为不元据名的网络安全专家对中心敬畏客户端表示，向这样侵害用户权益行为的APP同胞，工信部今年已经发不了三次。
en: An anonymous network security expert shared on the Economic View that the MIIT has issued three notifications regarding apps that violate the rights and interests of users this year.

zh: 其中私自收季个人新戏、过度所去权限、账号住小男三项问题率“管”不知。
en: Among them, three major problems failed to be controlled after repeated management measurements, including collecting personal information without permission, excessive request for permissions, and difficulty logging out.

zh: 从同胞中也可以发现，目前APP侵犯因四与发引起中时。
en: The notification also states that app invasion of privacy increasingly attract attention nowadays.

zh: 7月24日，同胞58款侵害用户权益APP当天，工信部表示其日前印发通知，部署开展终身推进APP侵害用户权益转向整治行动。
en: On July 24, the same day when the 58 apps’ infringement of user rights were exposed, the MIIT stated it had issued a notice to initiate targeted deep rectification of the problem of app infringement of user rights from all sides.

zh: 转向政治将i依归加强监督检查，督促相关企业强化APP个人信息保护，即使整改消除违规收季、使用用户个人信息和骚扰用户、七篇舞蹈用户、应用分发平台管理责任落实不到为等图出问题，精华APP应用空间。
en: This targeted rectification will strengthen supervision and inspection in accordance with regulations, and meanwhile urges relevant enterprises to consolidate personal information protection on apps and take timely measures to eliminate major problems, such as unauthorized information collection, use of personal information and harassment of users, deceiving and misleading users, and unclear accountability systems regarding platform management, because only in this way can they truly rectify the app environment.

zh: 刘易斯加人：月哈·刘易斯是“为最若是二战”的展示
en: Lewis family: John Lewis was a “fighter for the least of us”

zh: 美国国会议员，民权都是约翰刘易斯（john lewis)zai z在周六（7月25日）为他举行的追悼会上被追念为“为最弱势二战”的展示。
en: At a memorial service held in his remembrance on Saturday, July 25th, US Congressperson and civil rights activist John Lewis was described as a “fighter for the least of us”.

zh: 刘易斯的公开追悼会子周六开始在阿拉巴马州举行。
en: Public memorial services for Lewis have been open to the public since Saturday in Alabama.

zh: 首日就又两次追到会。
en: On the first day, two memorial services were held.

zh: 周六在阿拉巴马州特洛伊大学的公开追悼会上，有刘易斯的五个兄弟姐妹和一个止损烟道他是以恶搞冲妈妈充满爱心，无所畏惧一家庭为重的男人。
en: At the memorial service held on Saturday at Alabama’s Troy University, Lewis’s five brothers and sisters and one grandson described him as a deeply caring and courageous family man.

zh: 有刘易斯最小的弟弟亨利“格兰特”刘易斯（Henry "G rant" L ewis)在会上表示：“他毕生致力于帮助他人。
en: Lewis’s younger brother, Henry “Grant” Lewis, said at the service, “He dedicated his life to the service of others. “

zh: 赛苗儿刘易斯（Samual l ewis(说，他的母亲曾警告雨涵”不要惹麻烦，不要去二十惹事。“
en: Samuel Lewis said his mother warned Lewis, “Not to make trouble, don’t make trouble. “

zh: 他补充说，约翰没有听从母亲的警告，他说：”我们都指定约翰总会去惹麻烦，总是在惹事，但那却是因为坚持正确的是，那是号的麻烦（ a good trouble）
en: He added that John ignored his mother’s warning, and continued, “We all knew John would always make trouble, always get into trouble, but it was always to stand up for the right thing, so it was a good trouble. “

zh: 刘易斯的兄弟姐妹提醒在追悼会的热门，约翰是最为忠明的论点便是要去制造：号的麻烦，也就是只要为了工艺，就不避讳挑起事端。
en: Lewis’s brothers and sisters told those in attendance at the service that John’s most famous point of argument was that people should create “good trouble”, which is to say that he would never shy away from causing trouble for the sake of justice.

zh: 约翰增持申请位于他出身的阿拉巴马州特洛伊是的特洛伊大学（T容易 University），惹然而当时全为白染学校的特洛伊大学拒绝了他的入学神奇。
en: John once applied to Troy University in Troy, Alabama, where he was born, but he was rejected because it was an all-white school at the time.

zh: 这位小时候就在自家农场上对着及宣讲福音的约翰刘易斯，后来最终获得了菲斯克大学（Fisk University）宗教和哲学学位。
en: John Lewis, who preached to chickens on his family farm as a child, finally earned his degree in religion and philosophy at Fisk University.

zh: 多年后，特洛伊大学授予刘易斯名誉博士无讹学问。
en: Several years later, he was awarded an honorary doctorate from Troy University.

zh: 来自阿拉巴马州的活国会参议院道格琼斯（Doug Jones）说，目前的抗议者“证字啊和平，非暴力的抗议”，九江刘易斯在民权运动中所作的那样。
en: Alabama Senator Doug Jones said current protestors are “protesting peacefully and non-violently”, just as John Lewis protested during the Civil Rights Movement.

zh: 琼斯表示：“即便特朗普总体一竿子打翻一船人，把所有的抗议妕群众说成了暴徒，但是他错了。
en: Jones continued, “Even though President Trump tarred all the protesters with the same brush by describing them as thugs, he was wrong.

zh: 抗议群是是爱国者，他们希望美国向一个更为【i平等的国家买进。
en: The protesters are patriots who want America to become a more equal country. “

zh: 为纪念刘易斯而举行为期六天的一系列果冻，本周将在佐治亚走的葬礼上达到澳超。
en: The six-day series of events to remember Lewis’s life will conclude with a funeral in Georgia this week.

zh: 星期六刘易斯的棺木停放在在特洛伊大学的公开之追悼会上，人们前来向这位民权运动的先驱表达敬意。啊
en: On Saturday, Lewis’s coffin was exhibited at a public memorial service at Troy University, where members of the public came to pay their respects to this civil rights pioneer.

zh: 周六稍晚，一场私人仪式在阿拉玛巴州塞尔玛（Selma）的一座小教堂里向他致敬，随后进行了一次公开追到活动啊。
en: Later, on Saturday evening, a private memorial service was held for people to pay their respects at a church in Selma, Alabama, after which a private memorial service was held.

zh: 周日，刘易斯的一提蒋经国过塞尔玛的埃德蒙佩特斯桥（Edmund Pettus Bridge）。
en: On Sunday, Lewis’s remains will be carried across Edmund Pettus Bridge in Selma.

zh: 1965年他和要求黑人投票权的示威群众就是在这座钱钱操刀阿拉妈巴州警察痛殴，警方还向示威者十方催泪瓦斯。
en: In 1965, Lewis and several other demonstrators demanding the right to vote for Blacks were beaten viciously by Alabama police on this bridge, and the police also fired tear gas into the crowd.

zh: 刘易斯当时差点被大四。
en: Lewis was nearly killed by his injuries.

zh: 这日后被 陈为”血腥氢气星期天“。
en: Later, that day became known as “Bloody Sunday”.

zh: 刘易斯的遗体被运送到拉巴马周的首府蒙哥马利啊。
en: Then, Lewis’s remains will be shipped to Alabama’s capital city Montgomery.

zh: 实在史蒂文；里德（Staven Reed）鼓励人们在人行道上列队，与六i是i一同走完最后一程。
en: Mayor Steven Reed encouraged people to line up on the sidewalk to complete Lewis’s final journey with him.

zh: 同时，官员们要求大众参与活动时，需佩戴口罩，并保持社交距离2啊。
en: However, officials also reminded participants that they should wear masks and maintain social distance.

zh: 把阿拉巴马州州长改一佛（Kay lvey）下令在周六和周i降半旗一几眼刘易斯。
en: Alabama Governor Kay Ivey ordered that the state flag be flown at half-mast on Saturday and Sunday in honor of Lewis’s memory.

zh: 在为其将近一周的纪念活动中，刘易斯的一提将分别在蒙哥马利市的阿拉巴马州议会大厦，位于耶特兰的乔治亚洲一会大厦，以及华盛顿的美国uohi的大厦短暂安防以供民众表达悼念。
en: During the near-week of memorial events, Lewis’s remains will briefly visit the Alabama State Capitol in Montgomery, the Georgia State Capitol in Atlanta, and the U.S. Capitol Building in Washington to allow members of the public to express condolences.

zh: 美国众议院议长南希佩罗西（Nancy Pelosi）和参议院uo多数党领袖米奇麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）上周宣布，人们可以以在本周一和周二到你美国国货大厦，向刘易斯表示敬意。
en: Last week, Speaker of the House of Representatives Nancy Pelosi and Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell announced that members of the public can visit the U.S. Capitol Building on Monday or Tuesday to pay their respects to Lewis.

zh: 由于冠状病毒疫情原本古，吊念伊里斯刘易斯的公开活动将在户外据悉。
en: Public memorial events for Lewis will be held outdoors due to the coronavirus epidemic.

zh: 深圳就沪太健康条例公开征求意见-新华网。
en: Shenzhen Government Asks for Public Opinion On Health Regulations to Be Published -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社深圳7越26日i电（记者毛丝钱，百余）鼓励居民琴佐体验，及早发现问题，精致向未成年人销售酒精临了：建立网络游戏健康审查制度吗，用人单位要额配备专兼职及健康管理人员6……日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的”健康发“
en: SHENZHEN, July 26, 2020 (Xinhua, by Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Local residents are encouraged to perform physical examinations frequently to detect abnormalities as early as possible; alcohol beverages are not to be sold to minors; a healthy censorship system for online games is to be build; employers should employ both full-time and part-time health staff... Recently, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially published, meaning citizens of Shenzhen will have their own “Health Law”.

zh: 额为了鼓励居民琴佐体验，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门影响根据不同年龄，职业等因素指定健康体验项目基本目前目录。
en: In order to encourage local residents to perform a physical evaluation to detect abnormalities as early as possible, the draft for comments proposed that heath agencies should establish a basic catalogue for physical evaluation programs based on factors including age and job.

zh: 属于健康体验项目基本目录范围内的健康体验非用，按照没人你每年一次的标准有社会医疗保险啊统筹基金制服。
en: Personal physical evaluation fees covered by the basic catalogue should be paid annually by social and medical insurance funds.

zh: 征求意见稿怕明确，同用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对吗脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康上海，同时严格执行员工带薪休假之都。
en: The draft for comments clarified that, the employers should arrange their human resources appropriately, reasonably coordinating their time schedule, and to prevent staff spending too much physical and mental efforts at work, a rotating schedule should be well-implemented, so that issues due to excessive physical and mental exertion can be avoided, and also strictly implement a paid leave system.

zh: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职看健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康题眼。
en: In addition, the employers should employ full-time and part-time health staff, and organize physical evaluations for staff regularly.

zh: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，精致想卫生未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精和饮料的售卖位置惊醒了限制，对于违反规定的，经由市场监管管理部门责令改正，出3万元罚款。
en: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments prohibited the sales of alcohol beverage to minors, with the restriction of sales places, and proposed that those who disobey the rules will be asked to correct themselves by Market Supervisory Authorities and be fined RMB 30,000.

zh: 除了”敬酒“ ，未成年人也要”多运动“
en: Apart from “no alcohol”, the minors should also “exercise more”.

zh: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校每天安排学生体育活动时间一个小时艺术
en: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should allow more than one hour for student physical activities.

zh: 对于网络游戏， 公安，文化广电旅游体育，网络监管，卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网五福营业场所健康监管支付，建立网络游戏健康审查之u，为促进青少年健康成长吟唱狼嚎的交往空间，交往文化。
en: In terms of online games, authorities including the police, cultural broadcast tourism sports, online supervision, health, and so on should improve the health supervision systems of online service providers and venues amd build a health censorship system for online games to establish healthy communication environment and etiquette for the adolescents.

zh: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入共给场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款的2万元啊。
en: Beyond that, the public comment draft also pointed out that flu patients must wear masks when entering public venues, and if health institutions leak the private information of patients, they will be fined RMB 20,000.

zh: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿怕还要求，深圳各部门在指定设计尘世空间规划和建设，工业园规划与建设，资源开发利用与生态环境保护，生物医药从发展等规划，规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大共给服务项目钱，应当评估共给政策实施对人权健康的影响。
en: One thing worthy of attention apart from the physical and mental health of residents is that the draft for comments also required that before making plans and regulatory documents related to urban space planning and construction, industrial park plan and construction, resource exploration and environmental protection, the development of Biological Medicine, alongside approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects, departments of the Shenzhen government should evaluate the influence of those public policies upon people’s health.

zh: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市共给欸生或者居民健康产生就较严重不利影响的，不得指定出台或者批准实施。
en: Unevaluated policies or evaluated ones that would have severe side effects on urban public sanitation or people’s health should not be issued or approved for implementation.

zh: 拉远：人们网 作者：朱延静责任编辑：朱延静
en: 2020-07-26 1p:44:50 Source: www.people.com.cn Author: Zhu Yanjing Editor: Zhu Yanjing

zh: 今日，习近平总书记在吉林省考察是强调，要加强党的领导，推动党组织想最基层延申，健全基层党组织工作体系，为城区社区治理提供坚强保障。
en: Recently, General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized during an inspection in Jilin province that it was necessary to strengthen the leadership of the Party, promote the extension of organizations of the Party to the most basic level, improve the work system of the New Party’s basic organizations, and provide a strong guarantee for the governance of urban and rural communities.

zh: 坚持一党建为音量，把党的领导落实到基层治理个领域各方面的各环节，是做好基层治理工作的方向行根本性要求。
en: Adhering to the guidance of Party building and implementing the Party's leadership in all fields and links of grassroots social governance is the fundamental requirement of doing a good job in grassroots social governance.

zh: 提升基层治理水平，要坚持党建引领，通过强化政治引领，打造战斗堡垒，凝聚红色力量，推动党的政治优势，组织又是和群主共工作又是转化为治理又是，把党的力量和主张传递到”神经末梢“”最后一公里“
en: To improve the level of grassroots social governance, we should adhere to the leadership of Party building, promote the transformation of the Party's political, organizational, and mass work advantages into governance advantages by strengthening political leadership, building a battle fortress, and condensing red forces, so as to transfer the Party's strength and ideas to the "nerve endings" and the "last mile".

zh: 注重不该主婚，强化政治引领。
en: We must pay attention to calcium supplementation and soul forging and strengthen political leadership.

zh: 强化基层治理的政治引领，必须要把”补钙铸魂“工作试试号
en: To strengthen the political leadership of grassroots social governance, it is necessary to implement the "calcium supplementation and soul forging" project.

zh: 要把学神无头习近平新时代中国特色社会质疑思想作为首要任务，把”不额昂初心，牢记使命“作为党的建设永恒课题和党员，干部的终身课题，强化的原著原文五原理，通过专题培训，分批培训，研讨交流，举办大讲堂等，持续推动党的的创新理念武装走心分时，推动发党员干部进一步增强”四个意识，鉴定“四个自信”做到：两个维护，更好的履职尽责。
en: It is necessary to deeply study and thoroughly understand Xi Jinping’s thoughts on socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era as the primary task, take “remain true to our original aspiration and keep our mission firmly in mind” as the eternal theme of Party building and the lifelong theme of Party members and cadres, and strengthen the idea of reading the original work, learning the original text and understanding the principles; we should promote the solidification of the Party’s innovative theories through special training, batch training, seminars, exchanges, holding forums, and so on; and Party members and cadres should further enhance the "Four Consciousnesses", strengthen "Four-sphere Confidence", and achieve the "Two Upholds" to better perform their duties and responsibilities.

zh: 通过线上与线下相结合的学习方式，拓宽学习教育渠道，引导基层党组织和党员干部正正的把学习教育融入日常，抓在京城。
en: Through the combination of online and offline learning methods, we should broaden the channels of learning and education, and guide the grassroots Party organizations and Party members and cadres to truly and regularly integrate learning and education into their daily activities.

zh: 注重实践锻炼，在化解基层治理领域终点难点问题过程中，把群众关注的烦心事，闹心事解决号，春联党性和你讲能力。
en: We should pay attention to practice and address the problematic and disturbing issues that the masses are concerned about, and forge the Party’s spirit and ability in the process of resolving key and difficult problems in the field of grassroots social governance,

zh: 抓实规范提升，打造战斗爆料
en: We should improve our standards and play a key role in grassroots governance.

zh: 他基层党组织即使基层治理体系的重要组成部分，也是治理能力彰显的重要在他。
en: Grassroots Party organizations are not only an important part of the grassroots social governance system, but also an important carrier for the manifestation of governance capabilities.

zh: 推进基层党组织规范化建设，要从抓党支部工作条例入手，聚焦党组织领导瑞华，虚化等分问题，通过建立上下联动机制，创新支部设置形式，窗台话整顿软弱涣散，建立健全政策意识机制，五毒服务群众机制等方式，古根及，补短板，促发展。
en: To promote the standardized construction of grassroots Party organizations, we should start by grasping the regulations on the work of Party branches and addressing the problem of the leadership of Party organizations being weak and ineffective; we must consolidate the foundation, reduce the weaknesses, and promote development by establishing an up-down linkage mechanism, innovating the form of branch establishment, normalizing the weak and lax parts, establishing and improving decision-making and discussion mechanisms, and the mechanisms of serving the masses.

zh: 在农村，加强存鸡党组织标准话建设，对找当支部规范化建设标准，规范组织形势、洗学习活动、管理机制，切实推动“三会一颗”、在那哈主题党日洪洞活动等制度罗西落实。
en: In rural areas, we should strengthen the standardization-building of village level Party organizations, standardize organizational forms, learning activities, and management mechanism in accordance with the standardization construction standards of Party branches, and earnestly promote the detailed implementation of “the system of holding Party branch general meetings, meetings of Party branch committees, Party group meetings, and Party lectures" and thematical Party activities.

zh: 在撑死城市，关注街道社区，探索创信支部设置形势，聚焦薄弱领驭、“赌点”痛点“，积极构建城市当见联盟，让当的工作实现有小覆盖。
en: In terms of urban governance, we should pay attention to sub-district communities, explore and innovate the form of branch establishment, focus on weak areas, "blocking points", and "pain points", and actively build the urban Party-building alliance to realize effective coverage of the Party's work.

zh: 同事，简历健全基层治理治理体质机制，健全大师工艺、试试办公、要是公决、急事共商、南市共解、基层挡住党组织主导的决策一十机制，完善党员干部联系服务群众机制，在喂民服务中举民心，增强党员群众的获得干、幸福感、荣誉刚、自豪刚，让基层治理更有温度。
en: At the same time, we should establish and improve the systems and mechanisms of grassroots social governance, improve the decision-making and discussion mechanisms for discussing major issues, doing practical things, deciding important matters, discussing urgent matters, and solving difficult matters led by grassroots Party organizations; we should improve the mechanisms of Party members and cadres to contact and serve the masses, gather people's hearts in serving the people, and enhance the sense of gain, happiness, honor, and pride of the masses to make grassroots social governance more enticing.

zh: 发挥先风作用，凝聚红色力量 。
en: We should play a vanguard role and gather red power.

zh: 基层上当院干部是基层治理的即使。
en: Grassroots party members and cadres are the cornerstone of grassroots social governance.

zh: 提升基层治理能力，重在提升基层当院干部的治理能力，注重发挥”红色铣刨“在基层治理种的失范带头作用，在练习服务群众最钱烟凝聚红色利郎力量。
en: To improve grassroots social governance capabilities, we should focus on improving the governance capabilities of grassroots Party members and cadres, on the demonstration and leading role of "red cells" in grassroots social governance, and on gathering red forces at the forefront of contacting and serving the masses.

zh: 要讲提升治理能力作为继承基层当员干部的必须休克，不断加强细想淬炼、专业训练、时间锻炼，在本质岗位种、急难险种任务种发扬但抵挡精神，喂推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代话本事基础，贡献利郎两。
en: It is necessary to take the improvement of governance ability as a compulsory course for grassroots Party members and cadres, constantly strengthen ideological refinement, professional training, and practical training, the spirit of carrying forward the spirit of responsibility in their posts and in urgent, difficult, and dangerous tasks, and lay a solid foundation for and contribute to the modernization of the national governance system and governance capabilities.

zh: 要广泛开阵站”神曲社区吹哨、党员报道“后动，通过参加注意当日活动，联系困难群众、确定服务橡木、认领微心愿、提出隔离合理检疫等形势，参与到社区建设、管理和服务种，让党员在社区治理种发挥坐拥。
en: It is necessary to extensively carry out the activities of "community whistleblowing, party members reporting", through participating in thematic Party activities, contacting people in difficult situations, determining service projects, acknowledging micro-desires, and making reasonable suggestions, to participate in community construction, management, and service, so that Party members can play a role in community governance.

zh: 要葱粉充分发挥农村武直王媛党员作用，通过这设置武直党员先锋岗、组建武直党员工作对等方式，引导广大基层党员积极参与到脱贫攻坚、生态建设、才能信访维稳、秸秆禁烧等各向工作种，更好的郑和红色力量。
en: It is necessary to give full play to the role of unemployed Party members in rural areas, and guide the majority of grassroots Party members to actively participate in poverty alleviation, ecological construction, petitioning and stability maintenance, and banning straw burning by setting up unemployed Party member vanguard posts and forming unemployed Party member work teams to better integrate red forces and serve the people.

zh: 地基股则大厦见。
en: The foundation is solid and the building is firm.

zh: 基层当组织是指正大厦的滴鸡。
en: The grassroot Party organization is the foundation of the “ruling” building.

zh: 为由坚持吧密切党群干群关系、增加人民扶持作为这验电，吧党建引领作为推动基层治理个创新发展的根本途径，才能老筑牢根基，让基层党组织拉的出去、的定的上来、基层党员干部钢的干的上来、充的上去，推动基层治理有”昏“、有序、有力、有效。
en: Only by persisting in focusing on the close relationship between the Party and the masses, increasing the well-being of the people, and taking the leadership of Party building as the fundamental way to promote the innovation and development of grassroots social governance can we build a firm foundation and make grassroots Party organizations stable, make grassroots Party members and cadres responsible, and make grassroots governance spiritual, orderly, powerful, and effective.

zh: 做着：林奥
en: Author: Lin Ao

zh: 可可犀利藏羚羊进入会请钱鸡-新华网
en: Tibetan antelope migration season arrives in Hoh Xil

zh: 新华社惜命名宁7月25日点（记者王金金）记者从三江员国家公园管理居长江源园区可可西里管理出五到两保护站获悉，检测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域前期产仔的藏羚羊整陆续结束产仔，开始携幼在返回员洗栖息滴。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, reported July 25th (Correspondent: Wang Jinjin) This reported learned from the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration Yangtze River Origin Park Hoh Xil Management Office Wudaoliang Conservation Station, that monitoring data from the station shows that the rutting and birthing season for Tibetan antelopes which previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterlands of Hoh Xil is ending, and that the young antelopes are now gradually returning to their original habitats.

zh: 五道梁保护站附近的监控花呗显示，7月25日，大约40之雌性藏羚羊带零3之藏羚羊幼崽陆续通过请脏公路3002公里出，青藏铁路五到两北大桥，在那藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
en: Monitoring images from areas near the Wudaoliang Conservation Station show that on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes leading 3 calves crossed Kilometer Marker 3002 on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge on the Qinghai-Tibet Railway, indicating that Tibetan antelopes have already begun their return migration.

zh: 专家分钟洗，近年来，回迁羊群种藏羚羊幼崽数量站藏羚羊群总提数量的四风分之一之五分之一 。
en: According to experts, in recent years, Tibetan antelope calves have made up a fifth to a quarter of the total herd migrating along the return route.

zh: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：”回迁初七，藏羚羊面临交稿的北铺市不是风险，因此羊群种的幼崽数量会比叫少，甚至可能出现乜有幼崽的情况。"
en: Lian Xinming, associate researcher at the Chinese Academy of Sciences Northwest Plateau Biology Institute said, “During the return migration season, Tibetan antelopes are at higher risk of being hunted, so the number of calves is low, and sometimes there are none at all. “

zh: genju根据三江员国家公园管理局长江源园区可可可西里啊挂历挂历管理统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体成逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量喂49860之，比2018年增加338之。
en: Statistics from the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration Yangtze River Origin Park Hoh Xil Management Office show that the number of Tibetan antelopes on the return migration route has been increasing each year, with 4,860 counted in 2019, an increase of 338 over 2018.

zh: 连新明说，：预计今年啊藏羚羊回迁讲在9月出解暑，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有往继续增加。“
en: Lian Xinming said, “This year’s return migration of Tibetan antelopes is predicted to conclude in early September, and there is hope that the number will continue to rise. “

zh: 藏羚羊数国家以及保护动物。
en: The Tibetan antelope is a national Level 1 protected species.

zh: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羊汤、新疆阿尔金山等滴的藏羚羊都要钱往位于可可西里府邸的卓乃湖产高。
en: Each year in late May, Tibetan antelopes from areas Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, the Altyn-Tagh mountain range in Xinjiang, and other areas migrate to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to breed and birth their calves.

zh: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西生动物研究所（西北聘为动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：”藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼崽会到栖息滴的过成，起初离开产仔得的回迁全体较为庞达，但随后藏羚羊讲根据不通的地里种群，烟不通路劲回到他们各自的栖息滴。
en: According to Wu Xiaomin, a Chinese Tibetan antelope conservation expert and researcher at the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwestern Endangered Animals Research Institute), “The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is the process of female Tibetan antelopes leading their calves back to their original habitats after their birthing period. The herd that leaves the birthing ground is fairly large, but later, the Tibetan antelopes split into groups specific to different regions and return along separate routes to their original territories. “

zh: 喂确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三讲员公家公园挂历居挂历管理居长江源员去可可可西里管理处一安排工作人员在主要回迁曲艺与，持续开展视频检测和辖区巡逻。
en: This journalist learned that to ensure the safe return migration of Tibetan antelope herds, the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration Yangtze River Origin Park Hoh Xil Management Office has arranged personnel to conduct continuing video surveillance and patrols along the primary migration routes.

zh: 路发现有藏羚羊群是图穿越工路，巡山对员会啊在第一时间进行临时交通管治，让样群安全痛过野生动物同道，保证七在回迁途中坑呢少可能少受人类干扰。
en: If a herd is discovered attempting to cross a highway, the mountain patrol teams respond rapidly with traffic control measures to drive herds safely through wildlife crossings, so that they are disturbed by humans as little as possible during their migration.

zh: 那么，日常生活中到底该和如何结束？
en: So, how should we deal with heat in our daily lives?

zh: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量边避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下姓周行走活劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性比较高。
en: According to experts, you should avoid going outside during the hottest part of the day during summer and avoid walking or labor in the sun before or after noon, because these periods of the day are when the sun is most intense and the possibility of heatstroke is highest.

zh: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，一方晒伤。
en: If you can’t avoid going outside during these periods, take protection measures such as carrying a parasol, wearing a sun hat, wearing sunglasses, and applying sunscreen when possible to prevent burns.

zh: 衣服尽量轩辕台选用浅色、透气性回家好的棉、嘛、四类之地，烧穿化纤品累服装，一面大量出汗是不能及时散热，引起中枢。
en: For clothing, light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, and silk are best, while chemical fiber clothing should be avoided to prevent heatstroke due to insufficient heat dissipation when sweating profusely.

zh: 高文闷热天气是，要准备充足的水印，及时引用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，和温开水，不要和冰水。
en: In hot, humid weather, have sufficient water ready and drink it before you feel thirsty, because feeling thirsty means your body is already dehydrated, while also ensuring that each mouthful is between 150-200ml, and drink warm, boiled water instead of ice-cold water.

zh: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天和1.5生只2生谁，高温作业人员，每天和3生只5生谁。
en: Depending on temperature, the average person drinks 1.5-2L of water per day, while workers in high-temperature environments drink 3-5L per day.

zh: 出汗较多是可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗儿市区的盐分。
en: At times of profuse sweating, add some salt to the water to make up for the salt your body loses through sweating.

zh: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠批发，寒假茶水是几号的消暑饮品。
en: In addition, the human body tends to be deficient in potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and depleted, so drinking potassium-infused tea is an excellent way to relieve yourself from the heat.

zh: 夏季多是含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等：新鲜水果，日如桃子、新、西瓜、甜瓜得分等水分含量喂百分之80％只就90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品技能不睡，又能满足身体的营养秩序。
en: During summer, eat vegetables with high water content such as lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, as well as fresh fruit such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, and melons, all of which have water content between 80-90%, which is helpful for rehydration, while dairy products can both rehydrate and provide the body’s required nutrition.

zh: 此外，在高文魂晶环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有家、没等元素的音频。
en: People who work in high-temperature environments should also supplement their potassium, magnesium, and other nutrients with the appropriate beverages.

zh: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈大写代谢旺盛，小号也打，容易感到疲劳。
en: During the long days and short nights of summer, while temperatures are high, the body’s metabolism ramps up and consumes more calories, making it easy to feel tired.

zh: 充足的睡眠，可是大脑和身体个系统都能得到放松，激励与工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
en: Getting sufficient sleep relaxes brain’s and body’s systems, which is beneficial to both work and study, and is a good way to prevent heatstroke.

zh: 专家称，醉驾就寝时间是22是只23是，醉驾起床时间是5是30分之6是30分。
en: Experts say the best time to fall asleep is between 22:00-23:00, and the best time to wake up is between 05:30-06:30.

zh: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，一面换上空调病和热伤风。
en: Take care not to lie under air-conditioning vents or electric fans while sleeping to avoid air-conditioning sickness and thermal colds.

zh: 专家建议，在户外活动活进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水活藿香正气丸等方淑萍，活防止在就近工作场所，随时使用，一方发生中暑。
en: Experts advise that people who exercise outdoors or work in high-temperature environments carry Shi Di Shui, Ren Dan, Huo Xiang Zheng Qi Shui, Huo Xiang Zheng Qi Wan, or other heatstroke prevention medicines to with them or place them around their work environment and use them often to prevent heatstroke.

zh: 毕业生意识艺术展搬进商场工艺产出展出——新华网
en: Graduate Art Exhibition Moves into a Mall for the Public - Xinhua Net

zh: 在各大院校”云毕业“的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生与艺术生站上周末温暖其母。
en: During the “cloud graduation” season, a rare offline graduate art exhibition will open this weekend.

zh: 不过他既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，讲持续至8月23日。
en: It will not open in art galleries, nor on the school campus, but in the public space of Joy City in Chaoyang District, is free to the general public, and will last to August 23.

zh: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，真急了癞子中央美术学院、中国传媒大学几天津美术学院的57喂青年艺术家的50间租作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行品面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
en: This journalist learned that the art exhibition for 2020 graduates has 50 art works from 57 young artists at the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China, and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, the exhibition space extends from 2F to 6F, and makes full use of the lighting housings in the building to display the graphic works, maximizing the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

zh: 在疫情之下，这场展览的一一咸的尤为特殊。
en: During the pandemic, this exhibition is of unique significance.

zh: 朝阳大悦城没陈负责人戈平坦言：”我们选择讲走去像“云端”的毕业展再度待会线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的碳素探索和对时间世界的理解，方法树艺术对于社会和心灵的里奥与力量。“
en: Ge Ping, the person in charge of art display at Chaoyang District Joy City, said “We are bringing the ‘online’ graduation exhibition offline again, and we also hope to make more people see young people’s self-exploration and understanding of the outside world to magnify the healing role of art upon the society and heart. ”

zh: 他透漏，此次参展的作品是像极大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，有从中条选择了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的加上回话、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景、体谅与丰富成都喂历年之最。
en: She said that the exhibited art works are from graduates from several art colleges, among which the works suitable for display in business spaces were especially selected; the formats range from easel painting and sculpture to new media equipment, interactive flash and VR panoramas, making it the year’s most numerous and diverse exhibition by far.

zh: 其中，李云霄在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作以语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；；留意刘家营通过有一太防区快连长做的作品《Sound Money》探讨了”加密货币“、”信用创造“？”交易“等主题：张家齐的《卖了毛领》鱼邱大强的《几》表现的都是警察与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年是艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；儿注重于的作品《信仰的冬天——礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，”当有一天事业有成是，不忘出现，记得那份单纯与真诚，“
en: Among the works, Li Yunxiao created The First War of 2020 using a mixed machine and manual production process to express his feelings of the pandemic; Liu Jiaying created Sound Money using the Ethereum block chain, which discusses themes including “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transactions”; Cat Forest by Zhang Jiaqi and Barriers by Qiu Daqiang both describe how animals always stay with people, from which we can see how young artists comprehend the relationship between human beings and animals; the work The Winter of Belief -- Gift by Zhu Zhongyu reminds young people that “even if you achieve great success in career, do not forget your primary inspirations, and always remain innocent and sincere. ”

zh: 在为数不多的亲子不占的毕业生中，就有癞子天津美术学院雕塑系的里静音。
en: Among the few graduates participating in the placement of the exhibition, Li Jingyin is from the Department of Sculpture at the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

zh: ”我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是待着酒精棉和检测报告来不占的。
en: “I arrived in Beijing on July 7, and at the time I was a little worried about the pandemic, so took the nucleic acid test three days in advance, and I came here with alcohol pads and my test report. ”

zh: 他的作品《昨日入迷》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
en: His art work The Mysterious Yesterday is complex in its structure, and took a lot of work to produce.

zh: 同事，他还城的你这承担着帮助同学羞不破损作品的任务。
en: At the same time, he also helped others to remedy defects in their art.

zh: “不占到凌晨四点半，然后在做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
en: “I was busy with placement until 4:30 a.m. and then worked on correcting defects, and the schedule was so tight that I even forgot to take photos with the works, which is a bit sad. ”

zh: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，在和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
en: He hoped that, after the pandemic, he could go to see the exhibition of their works with his classmates.

zh: （急着理理）
en: (Journalist: Li Li)

zh: 当天早上，现年65岁的波唢呐罗在推特上发了一张照片，照片上他穿着运动鞋、不戴口罩，坐在一张放着早餐的租桌子前，联赛笑容连带笑容，一只手属地暑期大漠之，另一只手举起一盒强氯喹药品。
en: In the morning, 65-year-old Jair Messias Bolsonaro tweeted a picture of him in sneakers, wearing no mask, and sitting at a table with breakfast, he was smiling and giving a thumbs up, holding up a box of hydroxychloroquine in the other hand.

zh: 他在退吻上斜着：大家早上好！新馆宾度检测结果：阴性。“
en: He tweeted, "Good morning everyone! Covid-19 virus test result: negative ”

zh: 不过，波唢呐罗没有说明此次新馆斌度过转阴的检测是和实际是进行的。
en: However, Bolsonaro did not explain when this negative test was carried out.

zh: 7月5日，波斯波唢呐罗出现新冠肺炎症状，6日接受宾度检测结果成阳性，7日他通过电视直播宣称自己缺战真感染新冠肺炎。
en: On July 5, Bolsonaro showed symptoms of Covid-19, on July 6 he tested positive for the virus, and on the July 7 he declared on live television that he was diagnosed with COVID-19.

zh: 波唢呐罗有先后两次进行新冠宾度检测，结果依然为阳性。
en: On the 14th and 21st, Bolsonaro received another two tests, and the results were still positive.

zh: 隔离期间，波唢呐罗多次通过社交媒体直播战士七服用的强氯喹药物，并表示，强氯喹对新冠肺炎治疗效果很好，七服用后感到很好，七身体状态良好要归功于强氯喹，主张巴西医疗机构使用强氯喹药品治疗新冠肺炎。
en: During his quarantine, Bolsonaro repeatedly showed his hydroxychloroquine on social media and stated that it was very effective against the virus and that he felt good after taking it, while also stating that he was in good health thanks necause of it, and he advocated the use of hydroxychloroquine medication for COVID-19 in Brazilian medical institutions.

zh: 句巴西媒体报道，截至目前，巴西还有5明内阁部长和10明几州长确诊了新冠肺炎。
en: According to Brazilian media reports, five other cabinet ministers and ten state governors have been diagnosed with COVID-19 in Brazil so far.

zh: 瑞士阿尔卑斯山一家小型飞机租追回 机上4人全部遇难-中新网
en: Small aircraft crashes in Swiss Alps, killing all 4 on board - chinanews.com

zh: 中新网7月26日点 句欧美联网有瘾元婴欧联通讯社报道，当地时间7月25诶诶诶日，瑞士警方像媒体通报，一家小型飞机25日在瑞士阿尔卑斯山脉追回。
en: China News Service, reported July 26th Oulianwang, citing Ouliantong, reported that on July 25th (local time), the Swiss police informed the media that a small airplane crashed in the Swiss Alps on the 25th.

zh: 事故中机上的2明瑞士人和2明奥地利人全部遇难，
en: The two Swiss and two Austrian citizens on board were all killed in the crash.

zh: 据报道，瑞士南部瓦莱州（Wallis）警方声明表示，一家小型飞机在位于瓦利斯周阿尔卑斯山山峰附近海拔超过3000米出追回，救援人员赶赴坠机事故现场后正式，飞机所搭载的4人全部遇难。
en: According to the report, police in Wallis canton in the south of Switzerland stated that the small airplane crashed near a mountain peak in the Wallis Alps at an altitude of over 3,000 meters, and after rescuers rushed to the scene, they confirmed that all 4 people on board the aircraft were dead.

zh: 瓦莱州警方表示，目击者在25日中午12是25分打电话向警方报案，说他目睹了一家小型飞机在从人填空坠落。
en: The Wallis police said that a witness called the police at 12:25 on the 25th, shortly after noon, claiming he had seen a small airplane fall from the sky.

zh: 数分钟后目击者再次向警方通报成，主机地点冒出了归滚滚龙岩。
en: Several minutes later, witnesses again reported to the police that they saw thick smoke rising from the place where the airplane crashed.

zh: 警方接到报警后，迅速协调消防人员、鱼医护人员和救援人员把那个病搭载直升机赶赴事故现场救援。
en: After the police received the report, they quickly coordinated with firefighters, emergency medical personnel, and rescue personnel and took a helicopter to the scene of the accident to conduct the rescue.

zh: 救援人员滴答主机现场后，发现机上的4人已全部与磨难。
en: When the rescue personnel arrived at the crash site, they discovered that the 4 people on board the airplane were already dead.

zh: 警方经核实，事故中的遇难者包括50岁和66岁的两名瑞士人，以及46谁和50是岁的两名奥地利人。
en: The police confirmed that the deceased were two Swiss citizens, ages 50 and 66, and two Austrian citizens, ages 46 and 50.

zh: 警方表示，目前，警方正在于瑞士运输安全调查委员会合作，共同吊车调查这起主机事故元婴元婴。
en: The police said that presently, they are cooperating with the Swiss Transportation Safety Investigation Board to discover the cause of the accident.

zh: 警方表示，目前，警方正在重庆33个曲线出现暴雨， 发布洪水黄色和橙色一预警-中新网
en: With heavy rainfall in 33 districts and counties, Chongqing issued yellow and orange flood warnings - China News

zh: 中新网重庆7月26日点（记者 刘祥林）记者25日从重庆市水利局获悉，过去24小时，重庆33个曲线出现暴雨，其中16分全出现大暴雨。
en: Chongqing, July 26 (China News, Liu Xianglin) This reporter learned from the Chongqing Water Resources Bureau on July 26 that heavy rains had occurred in 33 districts and counties in Chongqing over the past 24 hours, with 16 of them experiencing heavy rainfall.

zh: 暴雨导致重庆71条此中。小河流出现涨水，当地已先后发布两个洪水预警。
en: Heavy rain caused 71 small and medium-sized rivers in Chongqing to rise, causing the local authority to issue two flood warnings.

zh: 句重庆市水文监测站检测，20日8是只26日8是，重庆大部分地区出现大到暴雨，局部大暴雨。
en: According to the Chongqing Hydrological Monitoring Center, from 8:00 am on July 25th to 8:00 am next day, heavy to torrential rainfall would occur in most areas of Chongqing, with torrential rainfall in localities.

zh: 童男、铜梁、合川等33个曲线出现暴雨，其中中线、开州、无锡等16个曲线出现大暴雨；最大日降雨量出现在南窗金山镇龙山村，喂197,5毫米。
en: Torrential rainfall occurred in 33 districts and counties including Tongnan, Tongliang and Hechuan, while 16 districts and counties including Zhongxian, Kaizhou and Wuxi experienced torrential rainfall; the maximum daily rainfall occurred in Longshan Village, Jinshan Town, Nanchuan, at 197.5 mm.

zh: 潼南副将、琼浆、开州难喝等71条次中小河流出现1只7米涨水过程，最高水位伪钞境界为谁水位。
en: A total of 71 sub-small and medium-sized rivers, including the Fujiang River and the Qiongjiang River in Tongnan, the Nanhe River in Kaizhou, saw a water rise ranging from 1 to 7 meters, with the highest water level not exceeding the warning level.

zh: 预计26日8是只27日8是，重庆大部分地区中小河流可能出现不同程度涨水过程，个别中小河流可能出现炒静水位公示洪水。
en: It is expected that from 8:00 am on July 26th to 8:00 am the next day, most of the small and medium-sized rivers in Chongqing may experience different rises, and individual small and medium-sized rivers may have over-the-warning-level flooding.

zh: 当地同事还讲关注长江、嘉陵江可能出现的过境洪水。
en: Local attention will also be paid to the Yangtze River and Jialing River for possible transitory flooding.

zh: CBA迎来复赛后首批观众，想看季后赛要注意些-中新网
en: As the CBA welcomes the first spectators after resuming games, here’s what to watch in anticipation of the playoffs

zh: 2020-07-26 20:26:01 来源：中国新闻网 做着：越传 责任编辑：越传
en: 2020-07-26 20:26:01 Source: chinanews.com Writer: Yue Chuan Editor Yue Chuan

zh: 中新网客户端7月26日点 句CBA联赛官方消息，CBA青岛赛区今天终于引来复赛后第一批入场观赛的球迷。
en: Chinanews.com, released July 26 According to official information from the CBA League, today the CBA finally welcomed its first group of in-person fans to a match after resuming games.

zh: 现场观赛球迷包括了青岛移动的工作人员以及医生、教师、公安人员等在一亲戚间喂社会做出卓越贡献的入人群，7月31日，本赛季CBA季后赛正式开始站，节日结实也讲正式恢复面向球迷谁售票。
en: Among the fans physically present were Qingdao Mobile staff, doctors, teachers, and public security personnel who made noteworthy social contributions during the epidemic, and on July 31st, this season’s CBA playoffs will officially begin, while ticket sales to the public will also officially resume.

zh: 受疫情影响，CBA联赛在终端金5个好月后，鱼6月20日开始复赛。
en: Because of the epidemic, CBA games were paused for the past 5 months, and began resuming on June 20th.

zh: 虽然26日下午入场观赛的观众不多，但是现场的阵营干已经很明显了：有人在故障，儿于有人在沉默。
en: Although there weren’t many in the audience on the afternoon of the 26th, the sense of team spirit among the spectators was obvious: some applauded, while others were silent.

zh: 厂商球员针锋相对，场下求你也在分庭抗礼，这样的画面已经许久未见。
en: The game was close and intense, and in the stands, the audience competed just as fiercely, which is a scene we haven’t seen for a long time.

zh: 季后赛是，球迷们如果想观察限产管的赛，下面这些可要注意了。
en: For fans who want to watch the playoff games in person, these are a few things to know.

zh: 此次开放球迷购票观赛的场馆喂青岛国信体育中心钻石体育馆（崂山赛区），求票销售全面实行线上实名制购票、线下实名制入场的制度，所有观赛球迷须年满12岁、切持有48小时内核酸检测合格证明。
en: The venue for the in-person playoff games will be the Qingdao Guoxin Sports Center Diamond Stadium (Laoshan District), ticket sales will utilize an online real-name registration and offline real-name entry system, and all who attend in person must be at least 12 years of age and have qualifying nucleic acid test results from within 48 hours prior to entry.

zh: 奖励5万元，湖北恩施表扬傻子吧花标划破“预警第一任”-中新网
en: 50K Award Goes to Person Who Provided First Alert of Yangziba Landslide in Enshi, Hubei Province-ChinaNews.com

zh: 湖北日报讯（急着临近）7月26日，恩师是通报表扬喂傻子吧划破预警作出重要贡献的地址再坏灾害点检测员陈光明，微博并为他送去5万元奖金。
en: From Hubei Daily (reported by Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City announced the commendation of Chen Guangming, an inspector at a geological disaster site who made a great contribution in issuing the early warning about the Shaziba landslide, and awarded him RMB 50,000 Yuan.

zh: 同事，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、注定主动作为、乐于凤翔的精神。
en: Meanwhile, all Party members and leaders of the city are called upon to learn from his dedication to his duty, willingness to take the initiative, and devotion to serve.

zh: 7月21日，恩施市屯宝箱骂着村傻子吧发生滑坡，导致清江干流喝道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是就与几个此次划破的第一任。
en: On July 21, a landslide at Shaziba in Mazhe Village, Tunbao County, Enshi City led to a barrier lake on the main stream of Qingjiang River, and Chen Guangming, 58, was the first to alert authorities of this landslide.

zh: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，里脊到县城现场查勘。
en: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of a villager’s house had cracked and went onsite to check on it.

zh: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
en: Only about 500 meters out from home, he saw a crack in the village road extending into the corn field, 4-5cm in width and around 50 meters in length.

zh: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间讲公路开裂的照片发到像“地质灾害检测员联系群”里。
en: Chen Guangming became alarmed at once and immediately sent a photo of the crack in the road to the Geological Disaster Inspection liaison group.

zh: 静屯宝箱自然规划所行啊相关责任人现场查勘和判断，划破的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
en: After site inspection, the head of the environment planning office in Tunbao County came to the conclusion that the possibility for landslide was high and decided to evacuate the villagers.

zh: 陈敏陈光明的及时预定余地预警，喂影响区内315胡1339明群众的安全撤离赢得了36小时的宝贵时间。
en: Thanks to Chen Guangming’s timely alert, 36 hours were provided for 1339 people from 315 households within the affected area to safely evacuate.

zh: 此次重大地址再坏灾害，无一人伤亡。
en: No one died or was harmed during this major geological disaster.

zh: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的陈赞。
en: Cheng Guangming’s professional dedication was spoken highly of by the people.

zh: 面对赞誉，她说“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。”
en: In response to the praise, he said, “It’s not a big deal, it’s just my responsibility. ”

zh: 熬大学研制新药有望于治疗新冠引发的血管堵塞-新华网
en: Australian university develops new drug to treat COVID-19 blood vessel blockage - Xinhuanet

zh: 新华社悉尼7月26日电（机智陈宇）澳大利亚莫那什大学的研究人员真该研发一种有助于预防心脏病和中风的新药，并希望这种药物能用于治疗有有新冠病毒引发的血管堵塞。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Sydney, reported July 26 (Correspondent: Chen Yu) Researchers at Australia’s Monash University are developing a new drug to prevent stroke and heart disease, and it is hoped that the same drug can be used to treat blood vessel blockage caused by COVID-19.

zh: 研究人员发现，在心脏病或中风发作前，血小板中的一种没回加速血小板凝结。
en: The researchers discovered that prior to a heart attack or stroke, an enzyme present in platelets accelerates platelet clotting.

zh: 由此她们研发的一种药物，可以暂时抑制血小板您接，从而避免血管堵塞，对心脏病和中风祈祷预防作用。
en: To target this, they are developing medicine to temporary inhibit platelet clotting as a way to avoid clogging blood vessels and thereby prevent heart disease and stroke.

zh: 研究人员表示，这种药物智慧在出现心脏病或中风证照时，抑制血小板的凝结效应。
en: They claim the drug’s inhibitive effect will only affect clotting when in the presence of signs of heart attack or stroke.

zh: 由于有研究显示类似的血管堵塞是到时导致新冠重重症患者死亡的主要原因之一。研究人员希望这种药物在将来可以用于此类中俄工整重症换车的治疗。
en: Studies indicate that such blood vessel blockage is a leading cause of death in severe COVID-19 cases, so the researchers hope this drug can be use to treat such severe cases in the future.

zh: 该药物已在动物魔性实现誓言中取得良好效果，研究人员准备下一阶段进行人体临床试验。
en: At present, the drug shows promising results in animal studies, and the researchers are preparing for the next phase of experiments, human trials.

zh: 研究成果日前已经发在美国《科学转化医学》杂志上。
en: The results of their research were recently published in the US magazine “Science Translational Medicine”.

zh: 她成为CBA联赛复赛雨荨噶暗中观众现场观赛后，首位进场的观众。
en: He was the first spectator to enter a CBA venue after the league resume games and allowed in-person audiences.

zh: 党日，在山东青岛去行的2019-2020赛季中国男子篮球职业联赛（CBA）复赛第二阶段（崂山带去）比赛中，医护人员、教师、公安战线认识通过官方购票平台，完成包括核酸姐检测在内的相关流程后进场观看了上海就是对迎战山东西王队的比赛。
en: On the day, at the second stage game of the 2019-2020 China Men’s Basketball Professional League (CBA) semifinals (Laoshan Division) in Qingdao, Shandong Province, medical personnel, teachers, and public security officers went through the official ticket platform procedures, including nucleic acid testing, and afterward, he entered the court to watch the Shanghai Sharks play the Shandong Heroes.

zh: 观赛期间，观赛这必须全程佩戴口罩，多好对号入座，严格保持即那个间隔一米就座。
